title: Some Google Assistant devices currently failing basic commands; ‘Sorry, I didn’t understand’
content:
It’s not uncommon for smart speakers of all kinds to fail once in a while, but it seems there’s a larger issue at play with some Google Assistant devices currently. If your Google Assistant device is suddenly saying “Sorry, I didn’t understand” a lot, you’re not alone.

more…

The post Some Google Assistant devices currently failing basic commands; ‘Sorry, I didn’t understand’ appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: For a substantial number of users lately, Google Assistant keeps saying "Sorry, I didn't understand" in response to basic commands.
